welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Erith, a charming town known for its historic landmarks and beautiful riverside views. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the unique culture and beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport handles all flights and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at London City Airport offers exclusive services for private jet passengers, including a VIP lounge and dedicated check-in area.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busier of the two terminals, serving mainly European and domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport serves mainly long-haul flights to destinations around the world.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights for Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly long-haul international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights for SkyTeam and non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights for Oneworld airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport with a 4-hour time limit.
